Class JobofferController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.haibasoft.jobber.controller.JobofferController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="joboffer")
 @CrossOrigin(origins="*",
             maxAge=4800L,
             allowCredentials="false")
public class JobofferController
extends java.lang.Object
